favourite.article: My life I give to You “I will never leave you” (Hebrew 13:5) My dreams and future, too “Nor will I forsake you” (Hebrew 13:5) Oh Lord I do! I do! I do! I love You Lord I really do Oh Lord, I give my dream and future to you. Make me the young people that can satisfy You Lord. Thank You for carrying me through the storm and thank You for not forsaking me when I refuse to listen and refuse to obey. You are faithful. I trust in You.
Lord, I am not ashamed of loving You. Keep me loving You every single day!
Praise You Lord we are faithless but You are faithful. Oh how we need Your strength and grace to run the race. Amen.
We consecrate our life to You! My life I give to You. "I will never leave you." My dreams and future, too "nor will I forsake you" Oh Lord I do! I do! I do! I LOVE You Lord I really do. :]
I am faithless, You're faithful still! Your love is stronger than my will.
I love You, Lord. I really do.
May we be like the morning dew.
We consecrate anew, do train conform us to You, may we be like the morning dew. How I love You; young people satisfying You :)
I love You Lord. I really do..:)

Oh Lord I do! I do! I do! I love You, Lord, I really do.
This hymn really speaks to me at the moment. Now I abhor myself. "Look away unto Me" I just cannot prevail. "It is by My Spirit" I am faithless, You're faithful still, Your love is stronger than my will.
So many times we think we can do things in ourselves, and we just fail. But praise the Lord we have this Wonderful One who is always there for us to turn to! Thank You Lord You love us so much, we want to love You more.
My life to give You "I will never leave You" My dreams and future, too "Nor will I forsake you" Oh Lord I do! I do! I do! I love You Lord I really do

His calls are irrevocable. Though we are not but He is really able. Thank You Lord for sustaining us from strength to strength and grace upon grace. Lord, we give ourselves again to You. May we be like a morning dew, satisfying You!
Thank You Lord for sustaining me to run the race. My life I give to You. "I will never leave You." May we be fresh as the morning Dew. Oh Lord we love You. Your love is stronger than my will!

My life I give to You “I will never leave you” (Hebrew 13:5) My dreams and future, too “Nor will I forsake you” (Hebrew 13:5) Oh Lord I do! I do! I do! I love You Lord I really do.
I LOVE YOU LORD
If we really love the Lord and His Body we need someone to take up the burden to stand up for His move... Amen.
Your love is stronger than my will. Thank You for subduing me.

Now I abhor myself "Look away unto Me" (Hebrew 12:2) I just cannot prevail "It is by My Spirit" (Zechariah 4:6)
For every problem we have, the Lord will refresh and supply us with His Word.
O Lord, we love You! How can we not love Him when He speaks to us in such a way? Let's be a morning dew, enjoy the Lord and satisfy His thirst every morning.
"How I love You! Young people satisfying You!" Lord thank You for conquering me and loving me! My life I give to You!
Amen, Lord. Thank You that Your love is stronger than my will.

Praise the Lord! He will never forsake us. Though we are faithless, He is faithful still. His charming self and cheering love draws us to run to Him, and by His grace upon grace we are sustained to win the race.
This song reminds me that while we are pursuing Christ, we have the Word as our daily supply and encouragement. Each morning, may we renew our consecration to the Lord, loving Him more and more.
